CustomField.description: Tracks a user session so you can correlate user activity with a particular series of report events. This field is also available on the LoginEvent, AuthSession, and LoginHistory objects, making it easier to trace events back to a userâ€™s original authentication. This value is null if the event that was generated was from a dashboard refresh, a multi-block report, or a scheduled report. For example, 0YaB000002knVQLKA2.
CustomField.label: Login History Id
